Text:
Dear Rkstr
I just registered to say a big THANK YOU!
You're the best:-)

rkstr, please don't take offence because i think we are all very grateful for your uploads, and i know you have mentioned before that you don't do the edits of the shows personally, but once again, the editing (and this time the synching) is really really bad, almost like a child had done it. you miss significant chunks of dialogue, etc. Is it possible to find an alternative source for the original files because this occurs on a regular basis - or maybe just communicate with them. having said that, please don't stop. i'd rather have a poor upload than not one at all. thanks so much for all that you do!

@christianovers - I have one source for this show, I am not in contact with who ever caps it and if you don't like the editing you can either not watch it or just put up with it and not risk ,as you say,to  appear ungrateful.

The ironic thing is, it's his own fault.  There's nothing wrong with these files.  And, yeah, you VERY much do "appear ungrateful".  Very, very much so.  It's almost like a child is running your PC, ass.

Thanks rkstr.
thanks m8 (see what i did there?)

@christianovers i dont think you came off as ungrateful btw. seemed like a simple well meaning enquiry
Thanks again rkstr.
@saffronsghost he didn't appear ungrateful at all, you are acting like a fucking cyber bully. SHAME ON YOU. go suck a tit

Please guys, no squabbling in my torrent comments or I shall delete all episodes and discontinue uploading the show altogether.
I will say one last thing and then the subject is closed - this is is not my job, I do not get paid to do this.I do it in my spare time for the love of it. You are not my customers and you have no rights to complain about my uploads as if you do.You are pirating copyright material and if you are not happy with it suck it up or find it elsewhere
I'll upload s04e11 while the uploader is getting his panties in a twist.
